underlying_goal: To configure the temporary directory for Claude Code, set up an automated cleanup job for it, and commit the changes.
friction_detail: Initial temp directory priority logic needed refinement from the user to prioritize `$TMPDIR` first.
primary_success: Successfully implemented the entire feature, from configuration change to creating a cleanup script and scheduling it with launchd/cron.
brief_summary: The user wanted to change the Claude Code temporary directory. Claude updated the configuration, created a script to clean the directory, and set up a weekly scheduled job to run the script. The session concluded with committing and pushing the changes.
